name: Canon Father
description:
In a World where no one is willing to listen talking is useless..

All that is left - Total War!

YOUR MISSION:
Destroy all Enemy population by targeting their cities.
Protect your own population as much as possible.

CONTROLS:
- Use the mouse and left button to set targets.
- Use the mouse scroll button and/or number keys 1-5 to select a canon.
- Canons need time to recharge.

Good luck!

Any and all comments would be appreciated.
